short_summary: Qualified Supplier Partnerships (QSPs) for DPM P3 \\u2013 CMP
description: On October 27, 2022 Canada published ITQ B9220-220012/A as the first phase of the procurement process for the DPM P3 \\u2013 CMP. Canada is publishing a list of Qualified Supplier Partnerships (QSPs) that qualified under the ITQ and who will move forward in the next phase of the procurement process.
full_summary:
**Announcement: Results for the ITQ B9220-220012-A for DPM P3 – Case Management Platform (CMP)**

**Reference Number:** WS3228586309-Doc3987466604

**Publication Date:** May 15, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** March 31, 2024, at 14:00
**Contract Start Date:** April 30, 2024

**Summary:**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is announcing the results of the Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) B9220-220012-A for the DPM P3 – Case Management Platform (CMP). The procurement process was initiated on October 27, 2022. This announcement identifies the Qualified Supplier Partnerships (QSPs) that qualified under the ITQ and will proceed to the next stage of the procurement process.

**Procurement Details:**

* Procurement Category: SRV (Services)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Variations or combinations of the above methods
* Contracting Entity: PSPC
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Trade Agreements: None

**Notice and Reporting:**

* Notice Type: Request for Information
* Status: Expired
* Languages: English and French
* Contact Information:
	+ Name: France Cardinal (PSPC)
	+ Email: [france.cardinal@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:france.cardinal@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: Not available
	+ Fax: Not available
* Notice URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16280675?extsite=MTYyODA2NzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16280675?extsite=MTYyODA2NzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
